## Data


```{r}
input <- read_lines("input/10")
head(input, 3) -> inp
inp %>% 
  str_split(pattern = '') %>% 
  map(table)
```

- only closing / opening

```{r}
input %>% 
  map(str_replace_all, "[\\(\\[\\{\\<]", "O") %>% 
  map(str_replace_all, "[\\)\\]\\}\\>]", "C") %>% 
  map(str_count, c("O", "C"))
```
